title: Multiplying
text: Multiply the first equation by $$2$$ and subtract the second equation: $$2\left(x-2y+z\right)-2x+y+z=2\times3-4$$

pacedSpeech: and subtract the second equation:   2 times , x minus 2 y plus z  minus 2 x plus y plus z is equal to, 2 times 3 minus 4

title: Multiplying
text: Multiply the first equation by $$3$$ and subtract with the third equation: $$3\left(x-2y+z\right)-3x+4y+3z=3\times3-\left(-1\right)$$

pacedSpeech: and subtract with the third equation:   3 times , x minus 2 y plus z  minus 3 x plus 4 y plus 3 z is equal to, 3 times 3 minus negative 1
